mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: DevLink is a platform connecting people involved in IT who want to learn and grow together. Our goal is to create a place where everyone can find partners for collaborative projects, exchange knowledge, and build their portfolio through practical experience.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We want to be a place where people involved in IT can learn from each other, create collaborative projects, and build their portfolios. We believe that learning through practice and collaboration is the best way to develop professionally in the IT industry.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Rules for using the DevLink platform

section1.title: 1. General provisions
section1.content: These terms of service define the rules for using the DevLink platform. Using the service means acceptance of all terms and conditions.

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.content: Service - the DevLink platform available at the internet address. User - a natural person using the service. Content - all materials posted by users.

section3.title: 3. Terms of use
section3.content: The service is intended for people involved in the IT industry. Users are obliged to follow professional ethics and mutual respect.

section4.title: 4. User rights and obligations
section4.content: Users have the right to create projects, communicate with other users and build their portfolio. The obligation is to respect copyrights and not publish illegal content.

section5.title: 5. Data protection
section5.content: The administrator protects users' personal data in accordance with applicable data protection regulations. Details of data processing are contained in the privacy policy.

section6.title: 6. Responsibility
section6.content: Users bear full responsibility for the content they publish. The administrator is not responsible for damages resulting from the use of the service.

section7.title: 7. Final provisions
section7.content: The terms may be changed by the administrator. Users will be informed about changes through the service. In matters not regulated, Polish law provisions apply.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: For matters related to the terms, you can contact the administrator through the contact form available in the service.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your personal data

section1.title: 1. Data controller
section1.content: DevLink is the controller of your personal data. Contact with the controller is possible through the contact form in the service.

section2.title: 2. Types of processed data
section2.content: We process only data provided by you during registration: email address and password. We do not collect additional personal data.

section3.title: 3. Purpose of processing
section3.content: We process data to provide service services, enable communication between users, personalize content and ensure service security.

section4.title: 4. Legal basis
section4.content: Data processing takes place on the basis of your consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR) and for the purpose of performing the service agreement (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).

section5.title: 5. Retention period
section5.content: We store data for the duration of the user account. Our service does not have an account deletion function, so data is stored until consent to data processing is withdrawn.

section6.title: 6. Your rights
section6.content: You have the right to access your data, correct it, delete it, limit processing, transfer data and file a complaint with the supervisory authority.

section7.title: 7. Security
section7.content: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction or unauthorized disclosure.
